Text.Page:
A good merchant knows how to turn a profit. I got great leather from an adventurer that came through here not so long ago.

Made great gloves out of itâ€”the woodcutters just loved them."Neat."

Yes. I tried to get more of that leather to make more of those gloves, but I can't take down the animal that bears it.

If you can head into the cave and pick up some of that leather for me, I'll pay you very well.
You've brought so much leather! Thank you! This is exactly the sort of thing I'll need.
I really need to get that leather. Please help me out.
